Line 40: Line 40:
Holly also counsels glee club members [[Santana Lopez|Santana]] ([[Naya Rivera]]) and [[Brittany Pierce|Brittany]] ([[Heather Morris (actress)|Heather Morris]]) when they express confusion about their sexuality. She joins them for a performance of "[[Landslide (song)|Landslide]]" by [[Fleetwood Mac]], after which Santana confesses that she is in love with Brittany and wants to be with her. However after Kurt's experiences being a [[homosexual|gay]] student at McKinley, Santana is afraid of being ostracized by the student body for being in a [[same-sex relationship]]. Brittany reciprocates her love, but explains that she also loves her boyfriend [[Artie Abrams|Artie]] ([[Kevin McHale (actor)|Kevin McHale]]) and will not break up with him, to Santana's distress.
Holly also counsels glee club members [[Santana Lopez|Santana]] ([[Naya Rivera]]) and [[Brittany Pierce|Brittany]] ([[Heather Morris (actress)|Heather Morris]]) when they express confusion about their sexuality. She joins them for a performance of "[[Landslide (song)|Landslide]]" by [[Fleetwood Mac]], after which Santana confesses that she is in love with Brittany and wants to be with her. However after Kurt's experiences being a [[homosexual|gay]] student at McKinley, Santana is afraid of being ostracized by the student body for being in a [[same-sex relationship]]. Brittany reciprocates her love, but explains that she also loves her boyfriend [[Artie Abrams|Artie]] ([[Kevin McHale (actor)|Kevin McHale]]) and will not break up with him, to Santana's distress.

Lauren is annoyed with Puck for joining the celibacy club, but when he explains that he is trying to take responsibility for his actions, she kisses him and agrees to join too.
+
Lauren is annoyed with Puck for joining the celibacy club, but when he explains that he is trying to take responsibility for his actions, she kisses him and agrees to join too. Holly is dismissed from her teaching position due to parental complaints about her classes. She tells Will that she wants to learn about romance; he offers to teach her, and they kiss.
â
later in the celibacy club, Puck finds out that Quinn has hickie, which she denies, however, in her flashback, Finn has given her hickie.
